headline.main: Delaware Court Says Death Penalty Ruling Is Retroactive
headline.print_headline: Delaware Court Says Death Penalty Ruling Is Retroactive

docs.snippet: A Delaware Supreme Court ruling earlier this year declaring the state's death penalty law unconstitutional is retroactive, meaning an inmate convicted of killing a police officer must be resentenced to life in prison, the justices said in a follow...
docs.lead_paragraph: A Delaware Supreme Court ruling earlier this year declaring the state's death penalty law unconstitutional is retroactive, meaning an inmate convicted of killing a police officer must be resentenced to life in prison, the justices said in a follow-up decision Thursday.

headline.main: Officials in 24 States Urge Trump to Kill Obama Carbon Plan

headline.main: Global Warming's Fingerprints Seen in 24 Weird Weather Cases
headline.print_headline: Global Warming's Fingerprints Seen in 24 Weird Weather Cases

headline.main: APNewsBreak: Army Says Some Misconduct Trends Are Increasing
headline.print_headline: APNewsBreak: Army Says Some Misconduct Trends Are Increasing

headline.main: North Carolina Upheaval: GOP Bids to Limit Next Gov's Power
headline.print_headline: North Carolina Upheaval: GOP Bids to Limit Next Gov's Power

headline.main: Peace Can Transform Colombia Into Breadbasket for World, President Says
headline.print_headline: Peace Can Transform Colombia Into Breadbasket for World, President Says

docs.snippet: Curbing poverty and hunger in rural areas is crucial to building lasting peace in Colombia and in turn will help the nation become a breadbasket for the world, President Juan Manuel Santos said on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Curbing poverty and hunger in rural areas is crucial to building lasting peace in Colombia and in turn will help the nation become a breadbasket for the world, President Juan Manuel Santos said on Thursday.

headline.main: Hopkins Ready for Final Fight in Championship Career
headline.print_headline: Hopkins Ready for Final Fight in Championship Career

docs.snippet: Bernard Hopkins hobbled into the gym before a sparring session using a cane to aid his small steps. He scrapped his usual stylish Prada glasses for a cheap pair old fogeys might wear and a fake gray beard that sprouted several inches past his chin...
